emailAddress.description: E-mail address associated with the account.

isPrimary.description: Whether this email is the primary  email for the corresponding Entity_Id of type Entity_Type_Cd (e.g. Party) for the Tenant (Tenant_Cd) and for the specified email type (Email_Relation_Type_Cd).  Only one email per Entity. Tenant. and email type can be the primary. 1= True 0 = False

entityTypeCd.description: Defines the entity that Entity_Id refers to such as PARTY for Party_Id. ACCOUNT for Account_Id. etc.

effectiveDate.description: Indicates when the entity started using this email. If unknown. set to a minimum date (eg: 1/1/1900)

expirationDate.description: This points to the entity defined by Entity_Type_Cd. It can be a Party_Id. an Employee_Id. etc.
